name: ALL Inclusive
description:
You find yourself in the virtual world of the casino "LAS VIEROS" and you get a chance to try your luck. What mini-game will you play today? What additional bonus will accompany you? This is for you to find out.

The game is a collection of mini-games. In the main menu, you go to the dices, and with the help of randomness, you land on one of two maps and with one of two bonuses that slightly change your gameplay.

Obstacle course

On this map you can collect casino chips and you need to complete the map as fast as possible.

Bonuses:

1) There are conveyors on the map that speed you up

2) No bonuses

Alien ship

Destroy all airships and take advantage.

Bonuses:

1) Green projectiles

2) Red projectiles

Game developed by: Me

Buttons:

Obstacle course:
W,A,S,D - to move

Mouse - to look
Space - jump
R - restart level
ESC - quit game

Alien ship:

W,A,S,D - to move

Space/Shift- thrust
Left Mouse - shoot
R - restart level
ESC - quit game

Install Instruction

Download, unzip the file and execute the ALL_INCLUSIVE.exe


P.S.: Thanks to everyone who took part in this game jam. This is my first time and I had a great time.
